amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the authorization for the National Reconnaissance Office to the level authorized for fiscal year 1996.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 20 in the Congressional Record of May 21, 1996, to freeze funds authorized in the bill for Fiscal Year 1997 for the National Reconnaissance Office at the levels authorized for Fiscal Year 1996. (The dollar amount of authorized funds is not made public.)

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schroeder amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 292 (Roll no. 188).
